item.description:
APPLE PICKING - For those interesting in carpooling please indicate in your rsvp whether you need a ride or are willing to provide a ride.




106 West Acton Road, Stow, Ma. 01775

(978) 897-9287



Pick-Your-Own Apples, Peaches, and Pumpkins

Orchard, Country Apple Shop, and Farm Stand Concession

NOW OPEN 7 Days a Week
9 AM - 6 PM

Rain or Shine

Family owned and operated

Driving Directions Birthday Parties School Tours Hayrides Contact Us Employment Opportunities



Now booking school tours, birthday parties, and private parties for 2007

Call or email today to reserve.

Is your favorite variety missing from the list above? Don't despair - we offer over 20 varieties, including Cox's, Baldwin, Rhode Island Greening, Golden Russet, Winesap, and more.

Why pick Northern Spy? Read here.

FUN FOR THE WHOLE FAMILY!

- Hayrides, Pony Rides, Moon Bounce, Tractor Rally, Toddler Hay Maze, Sandbox

- NEW!!! Just opened HAY PYRAMID for tots

- Easy, free parking

- Easy walking to and through the orchard

- Smaller trees for smaller pickers
- Hot Cider Doughnuts
- Amazing Hand-Dipped Caramel Apples (Plain, M&M, Peanut, Candy Corn, more...)
- Apple Squares
- Fresh Baked Apple Pies

- Fresh Baked Chocolate-Chip Cookies, Brownies, Whoopie Pies, and other baked goodies.
- Hot Mulled Apple Cider
- Cold Sweet Apple Cider

- Lunch Menu: Croissant Sandwiches hot from the oven, steamed all-beef Hot Dogs, more!

- Kettle Corn

- Scenic Picnic Areas

- No orchard admission fee

- NEW!!! Now Serving Fresh-Brewed, Locally Roasted Gourmet Coffee from Sudbury Coffee Works

Where is Shelburne Farm located? CLICK HERE for a map and directions

Looking for a nearby place to stay? Amerscot House Heath Hen Meadow

CONTACT US TO SCHEDULE YOUR FIELD TRIP: 978-897-9287 or email office@shelburnefarm.com

Company Picnics and group functions, birthday parties. Weekday discounts available for corporate events. Call for details and pricing.

CATERING AND PRIVATE HAY RIDES AVAILABLE, CALL OR EMAIL US FOR DETAILS
